description: Copies the specified DB parameter group.

parameters.name: SourceDBParameterGroupIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier or ARN for the source DB parameter group. For information about creating an ARN, see Constructing an Amazon Resource Name (ARN). Constraints: Must specify a valid DB parameter group. Must specify a valid DB parameter group identifier, for example my-db-param-group, or a valid ARN.

parameters.name: TargetDBParameterGroupIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier for the copied DB parameter group. Constraints: Cannot be null, empty, or blank. Must contain from 1 to 255 letters, numbers, or hyphens. First character must be a letter. Cannot end with a hyphen or contain two consecutive hyphens. Example: my-db-parameter-group.

parameters.name: TargetDBParameterGroupDescription
parameters.description: A description for the copied DB parameter group.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags to be assigned to the copied DB parameter group. (dict) --- Metadata assigned to an Amazon Neptune resource consisting of a key-value pair. Key (string) --- A key is the required name of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws: or rds:. The string can only contain the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --/', --=', --+', ---' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-]*)$'). Value (string) --- A value is the optional value of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws: or rds:. The string can only contain the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --/', --=', --+', ---' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-]*)$').

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: A key is the required name of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws: or rds:. The string can only contain the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --/', --=', --+', ---' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-]*)$').

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: A value is the optional value of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws: or rds:. The string can only contain the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --/', --=', --+', ---' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-]*)$').

nested_items.name: DBParameterGroup
nested_items.description: Contains the details of an Amazon Neptune DB parameter group.

nested_items.name: DBParameterGroupName
nested_items.description: Provides the name of the DB parameter group.

nested_items.name: DBParameterGroupFamily
nested_items.description: Provides the name of the DB parameter group family that this DB parameter group is compatible with.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: Provides the customer-specified description for this DB parameter group.

nested_items.name: DBParameterGroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the DB parameter group.
